name: AlienCraft: Escape
description:
Your ship was smashed by a comet and you landed on planet called Earth.  You need to find a way to repair your engine and fly back to home. People won't be really firendly, so be aware. You can go out only at nights, so they can't find you.

CONTROLS

Move: W, S, A, D

Open chest: LMB

Open/close inventory: E

Use item: LMB on item/LMB on certian object in the world
